page.title: 06PGL Adventure Holiday
page.content: I went on an adventure holiday with the school. This is one of the activities I enjoyed. On Tuesday afternoon we went abseiling . Mrs. Cowlrick was the first to go down then it was my turn. The first bit was a bit scary but not very. Neil Moss and I were the only ones to do the Irish Crucifix.Neil's was alright but mine was slipping. After a bit it was alright. An {Irish Crucifix}is where you hang upside-down, with your arms out and legs together. Then some of us went down forwards.These are the people who did. There was Sally,Owen, Neil and I. It was much more exciting.By Ashley Toyn, aged 11.
